title: NII Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Scientist Post
description: The National Institute of Immunology (NII) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech., Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the NII Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. I...
